title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Tomburg is efficiently using its resources and/or does not explain that it is producing at a point on its production possibilities curve.
The response states that Tomburg is efficiently using its resources and explains that it is producing at a point on its production possibilities curve.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Perria has the comparative advantage in the production of butter and/or does not explain that Perria has the lower opportunity cost in producing butter: the opportunity cost of producing one unit of butter in Perria is 3/60 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIZaGaai4laiaaiAdacaaIWaaaaa@3901@ (or 0.05) unit of wheat and in Tomburg it is 1/6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIXaGaai4laiaaiAdaaaa@3845@ (or 0.167) unit of wheat.

The response states that Perria has the comparative advantage in the production of butter and explains that Perria has the lower opportunity cost in producing butter: the opportunity cost of producing one unit of butter in Perria is 3/60 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIZaGaai4laiaaiAdacaaIWaaaaa@3901@ (or 0.05) unit of wheat and in Tomburg it is 1/6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIXaGaai4laiaaiAdaaaa@3845@ (or 0.167) unit of wheat.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that no, these terms of trade are not mutually beneficial and/or does not explain that the terms of trade do not fall between the two countries’ opportunity costs (i.e., between 6 and 20 units of butter).

The response states that no, these terms of trade are not mutually beneficial and explains that the terms of trade do not fall between the two countries’ opportunity costs (i.e., between 6 and 20 units of butter).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that neither country has the absolute advantage in the production of butter and/does not explain that after the production of butter increases by 50%, both countries can produce a maximum of 90 units of butter with the same amount of resources.

The response states that neither country has the absolute advantage in the production of butter and explains that after the production of butter increases by 50%, both countries can produce a maximum of 90 units of butter with the same amount of resources.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate the number of unemployed people in Tomburg as 1 million and/or does not show the work.
